items.checkin_comment: Rich in taste, dark chocolate, dark dried fruits, alcohol spirits. Not as smooth as I expected, but otherwise great beer.

items.badge_description: Originally created and brewed for Russian Emperor Peter the Great, the Russian Imperial Stout has a history as rich as it’s roasty, hoppy flavor. That's 35 different beers with the style of Russian Imperial Stout! Try 5 more for Level 8!

items.checkin_comment: Pitch black with a light tan head. Aroma is chocolate, dark cherries and a hint of smoke. Taste is dark chocolate, coffee and dried fruits
